name: Xonitix
description:
Xonitix is an action-packed game for the computer terminal where you gain points by claiming space on the line while avoiding the moving dots. Think you have what it takes?

Currently it's OSX only, but Linux and Windows (err... DOS?) versions may show up soon!

Pass the "-h" argument for extra commands - it includes even a stealth mode that erases the game line so no one will know you were playing ;)

[Created for the Terminal Jam 2018]
